messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

issues with outlook application sent thursday update rename folder issue hi below issue happening again could you please have look also there any known issues with searching seem be able find meaningful results if search by lets say does give results ask extend search for other folders than current one thank you manager mobile next vacations th th february sent friday october update rename folder issue dear further our recent communication we believe your below query resolved if you with resolution there need for response however please let know if we can be any further assistance matter reference number summary rename folder issue resolver description sent thursday october rename folder issue hi have lately experienced issue when trying rename folders each try gives up run repair tool attached issue image however if choose run repair tool asks choose folder where apply attached haven tried understand what be effect doing what seems be entire doc saved disk could you please advise manager mobile next vacations th kind regards ext hub ref msg

I’ve checked if "Storage" applies, but it seems more about renaming folders and repair tools than a storage issue. I’ll respond with just the JSON object: {"category":"Miscellaneous"}.**Ensuring correct JSON format**

I need to confirm that the "category" property value is a string and matches one of the allowed categories. Thankfully, "Miscellaneous" is on the list, so that works for my response.
